name: src/base_api.js
BaseAPI
description: a base class for api definitions

name: constructor
description:
create a new Base API
sets up a logger member

name: src/bucket.js
BucketAPI

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Bucket>} - a promise to have created the bucket

params.name: key
params.description: the key of the bucket to create, must be unique

params.name: meta
params.description: the meta data to save against the bucket

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to call when bucket has been created

return.description: a promise to have created the bucket

name: set
description: set the current bucket in the Hoist context

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Bucket>} - a promise to have set the bucket

params.name: key
params.description: the key of the bucket to set

params.name: create
params.description: if the bucket isn't found should it be created?

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to call when bucket has been set

return.description: a promise to have set the bucket

name: get
description: get a bucket specified by the key

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Bucket>} - a promise to have found the bucket

params.name: key
params.description: the key of the bucket to get

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to call when bucket has been retrieved

return.description: a promise to have found the bucket

name: remove
description: remove/delete a bucket specified by the key

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} - a promise to have removed the bucket

params.name: key
params.description: the key of the bucket to remove

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to call when bucket has been removed

return.description: a promise to have removed the bucket

name: getAll
description: get a list of all buckets in the organisation

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Array<Bucket>>} - a promise to have retrieved the buckets

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to call when list has been retrieved

return.description: a promise to have retrieved the buckets

name: each
description: apply a function to every bucket in the current application

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} - a promise to have run the function against each bucket

params.name: fn
params.description: function to apply to each bucket

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to call when all buckets have been applied

return.description: a promise to have run the function against each bucket

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} - a promise to have applied the meta data

params.name: meta
params.description: the meta data to save against the bucket

params.name: key
params.description: the key of the bucket to save data to, applies to current bucket if not supplied

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to call when all buckets have been applied

return.description: a promise to have applied the meta data
